meanings.definition: A symbol or other design adopted by an organization to identify its products.
meanings.sent1: The company's logo is a unique logotypes that represents its brand.
meanings.sent2: I recognized the brand by the logotypes on their products.
meanings.sent3: The logotypes on the products seemed to have a secret message hidden within.
meanings.sent4: Her necklace had a logotypes that shone brightly in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The logotypes of the company was so memorable that I could draw it from memory.

meanings.definition: A single piece of type or other type of lettering used in setting a text.
meanings.sent1: The printer needed a specific logotypes to complete the document.
meanings.sent2: The book cover had an elegant logotypes that caught my eye.
meanings.sent3: The logotypes on the keyboard keys were fading from constant use.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting resembled the logotypes used in old newspapers.
meanings.sent5: The logotypes in the newspaper were clear and easy to read.
